description:
The Debian-based Tails amnesic incognito live system has been updated to version 6.6, a release that brings support for newer hardware, updated components, and bug fixes.

The post Tails 6.6 Improves Persistent Storage and Adds Support for Newer Hardware appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Tails 6.6 Improves Persistent Storage and Adds Support for Newer Hardware
